name.text: A name for the request content

templateParams.text: The template parameters of the content

lilt__v2__create__contentid___get.text: Get Lilt Create content by ID

meta.description: Get Lilt Create content by ID

lilt__v2__create__terms-and-conditions__.text: Sign the Lilt Create terms and conditions

signedAgreement.text: Signifies that the Organization has signed the agreement or not

id.text: A unique identifier for the generated content

name.text: A name for the request content

templateParams.text: The template parameters of the content

id.text: A unique identifier for the generated content

name.text: A name for the request content

templateParams.text: The template parameters of the content

labels.text: Comma-separated list of labels to add to the uploaded document

langId.text: Flag indicating whether to perform language detection on the uploaded file. Default is false

category.text: The category of the file. The options are REFERENCE, or API. The default is API.

file_hash.text: A hash value to associate with the file.

project_id.text: The project to associate the uploaded file with

labels.text: One or more labels. This will return the files which contain all of the given labels

is_xliff.text: Download the document in XLIFF 1.2 format,Default: true

limit.text: The maximum number of jobs to be returned

offset.text: Return jobs starting at the offset row

isArchived.text: Retrieves all jobs that are archived

isDelivered.text: Retrieves all jobs that are delivered

due.text: An ISO string date representing job due date

fileIds.text: A list of file ids to upload to job creation

isPlural.text: A boolean value representing if the files have plurals

languagePairs.text: Language pairs is a set of one or more pairs that includes source language, source locale(optional), target language, target locale(optional), and memoryId.

workflowTemplateId.text: Identifier of the workflow template to be used when creating a job.

isProcessing.text: The processing status of the job. Provide one of the following integers to indicate the status.

srclocale.text: An ISO 3166-1 region name for language locales

trglocale.text: An ISO 3166-1 region name for language locales

n.text: Maximum number of results to return, Default: 10

lilt__v2__memories___put.text: Update the name of a Memory

meta.description: Update the name of a Memory

lilt__v2__memories__segment___delete.text: Delete a segment from a memory

meta.description: Delete a segment from a memory

state.text: A project state (backlog, inProgress, inReview, inQA, done)

to_time.text: Unix time stamp (epoch, in seconds) of Projects with created_at less than the value

archived.text: A flag that toggles whether to include archived projects in the response (the default is true)

job_id.text: The Job to associate with this new Project

due_date.text: The due date. Measured in seconds since the Unix epoch

metadata.text: A JSON object of key/value string pairs

memory_id.text: The Memory to associate with this new Project

workflowTemplateId.text: The workflow template used to create this project

containsICUData.text: Contains ICU data. If true then tags in the source following the ICU standard will be parsed and retained.Default: false

fileId.text: List of File ids to be translated, comma separated

withTM.text: An optional boolean parameter to toggle the use of Translation Memory in the translation of the file

configId.text: An optional pararameter to specify an import configuration to be applied when extracting translatable content from this file

memoryId.text: Id of Memory to use in translation

status.text: One of the translation statuses - InProgress, Completed, Failed, ReadyForDownload

toTime.text: Results before this time (exclusive) will be returned, specified as seconds since the Unix epoch

fromTime.text: Results after this time (inclusive) will be returned, specified as seconds since the Unix ep

translationIds.text: List of translation ids, comma separated

meta.description: Get all of the possible Workflow Templates owned by the team.
